meanings.definition: A person who behaves obsequiously to those in power.
meanings.sent1: The king's lickspittles always agreed with everything he said.
meanings.sent2: The group of lickspittles surrounded the boss, hoping for favor.
meanings.sent3: The lickspittles in the court were like loyal puppies, always following the king around.
meanings.sent4: The lickspittles were like shadows, never straying far from the powerful leader.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lickspittles bowing and scraping was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: To behave obsequiously to those in power.
meanings.sent1: He would always lickspittles to the boss to get ahead in his career.
meanings.sent2: She decided to lickspittles to the influential politician for a chance at a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The way he would lickspittles to his superiors was both amusing and pitiful.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to lickspittles her way into the inner circle was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The politician's speechwriter knew how to lickspittles with words, always praising the leader.
